bedbaser 0.99.0

Create a GRanges object given a BED id

Source: R/bedbaser.R
bb_to_granges.Rd

Generates the column and types for broad and narrow peak files.

bb_to_granges(
  api,
  bed_id,
  file_type = "bed",
  extra_cols = NULL,
  quietly = TRUE
)

Arguments

api

API object of BEDbase created from bedbaser()

bed_id

integer() BED record identifier

file_type

character() bed or bigbed

extra_cols

character() (default NULL) extra column names to construct GRanges objects

quietly

logical() (default TRUE) display messages

Value

GRanges() object

Examples

api <- bedbaser()
ex_bed <- bb_example(api, "bed")
bb_to_granges(api, ex_bed$id)
